name: It's On Automatic Pilot!
Lore: 'Once he was airborne, Ric Olie transmitted rendezvous coordinates to every N-1 starfighter. It was all the direction Anakin Skywalker needed.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Your N-1 starfighters are forfeit +2. During every draw phase, opponent loses 1 Force unless they occupy a battleground system. Effect lost if you do not occupy two battleground systems with [Republic] starships.',
